TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit STGMEDIUM extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供用于数据传输操作的通用化全局内存句柄。

span.span: Provides a generalized global memory handle to use for data transfer operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通过 STGMEDIUM 结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台（MMC）进行编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the STGMEDIUM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
